The Associated Press Thunder beat Spurs, advance to Western Conference finals (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=139el2dte/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/thunder-beat-spurs-advance-western-conference-finals-030411291--nba.html

The Thunder flipped the script, and now they're heading to the Western Conference finals. Tim Duncan doesn't know yet where he's headed as the San Antonio Spurs face an uncertain future. Kevin Durant scored 37 points, Russell Westbrook added 28, and Oklahoma City beat San Antonio 113-99 on Thursday night to win the Western Conference semifinal series 4-2.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 22:22:03 PDT NBA urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,469982e1-18d2-350d-b954-8a6f2a1243c0-l:1 The Associated Press Sharks dominate from start in 5-0 Game 7 win vs. Predators (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12p43uooo/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/sharks-dominate-start-5-0-game-7-win-034518081--nhl.html

Captain Joe Pavelski and the rest of San Jose's big guns took little time to answer the questions about how this version of the Sharks would respond after a lackluster loss in a potential series clincher. Pavelski got San Jose off to a fast start in Game 7 with his franchise record-tying ninth goal of the playoffs to send the Sharks to their first Western Conference final in five years with a 5-0 victory over the Nashville Predators on Thursday night. Joel Ward, Logan Couture, Joe Thornton and Patrick Marleau also scored as San Jose shook off an overtime loss in Game 6 to reach the conference final for the fourth time in franchise history.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 21:53:54 PDT NHL urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,9d63f2f9-082f-3289-b781-6d7647883d09-l:1 The Associated Press Scott Skiles resigns as coach of Magic after just 1 season (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12f26fede/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/skiles-coach-orlando-magic-141525871--nba.html

Scott Skiles surprisingly resigned as coach of the Orlando Magic after just one season and team executives insist they never saw it coming. The Magic were busy Thursday trying to play spin control while also trying to make sense of the seemingly sudden decision by Skiles. The Magic improved by 10 wins under Skiles, finishing 35-47 but again missing the playoffs.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 14:07:24 PDT NBA urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,4c3c38fa-d57d-34ee-b8d4-335e4290d548-l:1 The Associated Press Day ties course record at Sawgrass with 63 for the lead (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12to60dau/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/day-ties-course-record-sawgrass-63-lead-184801194--golf.html

One birdie led to two more before Jason Day even hit his stride, and his round kept getting better until the world's No. 1 player was in the record book and in the lead Thursday at The Players Championship. When he blasted out of a tiny bunker within inches of the cup on his final hole, he had a 9-under 63, a two-shot lead and a fresh memory of the TPC Sawgrass. This one tied the course record.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 17:42:50 PDT PGA urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,52aedc6f-d141-3942-a908-b3ec8a6a3de6-l:1 The Associated Press Dodgers beat Mets 5-0 behind Kershaw's 13 Ks (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12tqbfuom/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/dodgers-beat-mets-5-0-behind-kershaws-13-043238363--mlb.html

Clayton Kershaw is on a winning roll and doing it ever so efficiently. ''It was special,'' Dodgers manager Dave Roberts said. Making his 250th career start, Kershaw (5-1) struck out 13 on 108 pitches and walked one to win his third straight.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 22:28:22 PDT MLB urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,77ab579b-da94-3de2-a90b-7c71aca7d798-l:1 The Associated Press LeBron says his retirement from NBA is 'up to my kids' (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12kdbpp4h/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/lebron-says-retirement-nba-kids-205136112--nba.html

LeBron James will soon face a triple-team he can't beat. The NBA superstar, who is making another run toward a title with the Cleveland Cavaliers, said Thursday that he will extend his playing career only as long as his three children will let him. James and his wife, Savannah, have two sons and a daughter: 11-year-old LeBron Jr., 8-year-old Bryce and 19-month-old Zhuri.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 13:53:42 PDT NBA urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,208ff372-4ed4-39ea-bc61-75a9197ce47c-l:1 The Associated Press QB Carson Wentz signs four-year contract with the Eagles (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12v1uqp81/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/qb-carson-wentz-signs-four-contract-eagles-224045800--nfl.html

PHILADELPHIA (AP) -- Quarterback Carson Wentz signed a four-year contract with the Eagles one day before rookie camp.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 15:41:48 PDT NFL urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,2d66c9a3-9546-3c36-863c-423d6654d78c-l:1 The Associated Press Price has 12 Ks; Betts, Bogaerts homer as Red Sox top Astros (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=12tbtcsug/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/price-12-ks-betts-bogaerts-homer-red-sox-022339254--mlb.html

David Price worked hard over the past week to fix a glitch in his mechanics he felt held him back during some recent starts. If Thursday's effort against the Astros is any indication, he's well on his way to regaining his mojo. Price struck out 12, Mookie Betts hit a three-run homer and Xander Bogaerts had a two-run shot to help the Boston Red Sox beat the Houston Astros 11-1 on Thursday night for their season-high fifth straight win.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 20:30:30 PDT MLB urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,7289f5cf-2ae7-388b-b23b-a76e35ecefb6-l:1 The Associated Press Russia, Kenya track teams may miss Rio after doping rulings (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=1363ekrpe/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/athletes-urge-wada-influence-russian-olympic-case-152709601--spt.html

Together, Russia and Kenya won 27 medals at the last Olympics in track and field. The Olympic hopes of the powerhouse teams from both countries took serious blows Thursday after the World Anti-Doping Agency delivered stinging rebukes to attempts to clean up their drug-addled programs. The WADA foundation board suspended Kenya's anti-doping agency after determining a new law passed there to combat doping was ''a complete mess.'' The agency also released new numbers out of Russia showing that testing by independent authorities has decreased by more than two-thirds in the past year.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 16:33:20 PDT WOLY urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,bf385c92-5916-326b-ab87-8f17e6085ec0-l:1 The Associated Press Patriots TE Rob Gronkowski makes Madden cover (Yahoo Sports) http://us.rd.yahoo.com/sports/rss/top/SIG=132h0m7l5/*http%3A//sports.yahoo.com/news/patriots-te-rob-gronkowski-makes-madden-cover-223014865--nfl.html

Rob Gronkowski parties almost as well as he plays football, and now he's showing off both sides of his larger-than-life personality as a cover model. Gronkowski was selected for the cover of the Madden NFL 17 on Thursday. At the same time, he'll be appearing on the front of GQ magazine along with model Hailey Clauson.


]]> Thu, 12 May 2016 16:12:32 PDT NFL urn:newsml:sports.yahoo,lego:19780928:top,article,d8a58665-9e2f-31fe-b3ea-d47ee68e25ac-l:1 Thu, 12 May 2016 22:28:22 PDT
